dc:title: Bill Gauchat: The Way of Peace
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Talks of means and ends by juxtaposing news of the end of the Vietnam war with an obituary for Bill Gauchat. A close follower of Peter Maurin, Bill Gauchat and his family exemplified a life built around all the works of mercy.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 551 1975-05-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
